name: Mega Q*bert
overview: Mega Q*bert is a new homebrew title for Sega Mega Drive/Genesis. The game features two different game modes - Mega, which is an all-new set of 80 different levels to beat, and Arcade, a recreation of the arcade original (based on the NES iteration) - and simultaneous cooperative gameplay, where two players share one view of the stage and set of lives. To make synchronization easier, each player has an option to instantly mount the other player's head, allowing them to do careful maneuvers when necessary.
